Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
 CEMAC_CHAN_MAC_ADDR_tagUsed to Initialize the Emac Driver Instance with mac addresses and channel information
 CEMAC_Config_sEMAC configuration
 CEMAC_ConfigInfo_sEMAC configuration data structure
 CEMAC_FxnTable_sThe definition of a EMAC function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific EMAC driver implementation
 CEMAC_IOCTL_CMD_RESP_sEmac IOCTL command response specification
 CEMAC_IOCTL_FDB_AGEING_INTERVAL_SFDB Ageing interval
 CEMAC_IOCTL_FDB_ENTRY_SFDB entry configuration structure
 CEMAC_IOCTL_PARAMS_SIOCTL parameters field of emac_ioctl API
 CEMAC_IOCTL_PORT_PRIO_MAP_SPort Priority configuration structure
 CEMAC_IOCTL_PREEMPTION_ENTRY_SProirity for frame premption configuration structure
 CEMAC_IOCTL_PREMPT_OR_CUT_THROUGH_MAP_SPcp to prempt or cut through configuration structure
 CEMAC_IOCTL_PRIO_REGEN_MAP_SPriority regen configuration structure
 CEMAC_IOCTL_SPECIAL_FRAME_DEFAULT_PRIO_SProirity for special frames configuration structure
 CEMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_DEFAULT_ENTRY_SDefault VLAN entry definition for EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_VLAN_ID sub-command
 CEMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_ENTRY_SVLAN FID table entry definition for EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_ENTRY sub-command
 CEMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_FID_PARAMS_SVLAN FID entry parameters definition for EMAC_IOCTL_VLAN_SET_DEFAULT_TBL sub-command
 CEMAC_LinkInfo_sEMAC statistics and link status data structure
 CEMAC_MAC_ADDR_tagMAC address specification
 CEMAC_OpenConfigInfo_sUsed to Initialize the Emac Driver Instance at time of emac_open
 CEMAC_PKT_DESC_sEmac packet descriptor specification
 CEMAC_STATISTICS_ICSSG_tagEMAC Statistics for ICSS The statistics structure is used to retrieve the current count of various packet events in the PRU-ICSSG system
 CEMAC_STATISTICS_tagEMAC Statistics The statistics structure is used to retrieve the current count of various packet events in the system. These values represent the delta values from the last time the statistics were read
